I saw Hana-chan Goto's recording,
The atmosphere when Hana-chan answered "Yes! and when she started to sing, the atmosphere was so different,
I was really surprised at the gap between the two. I had an impression of Hana-chan as a very cute girl,

I love Hana-chan's very honest vocalization, and I could feel it today as well,
I was also impressed that she was able to add so many nuances to the song, which is really amazing since it was her first single,
I'm looking forward to hearing more and more of Hana-chan's singing as her sense of rhythm and other skills improve.
That's all for now, this is the vocal recording of Hana Goto of Angulum Redline.
